img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled MiFi Mobile Hotspots

div.div: Tornillo ISD students are expected to receive mobile hotspots (MiFi's) on the week of April 13-17. Mobile service will include unlimited data and CIPA compliant filtering through Sprint's network.
div.a: Read More about MiFi Mobile Hotspots

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Health News - Corona Virus

div.div: Health officials are recommending local communities and schools should take the same steps to protect against coronavirus as we take to prevent the spread of everyday illnesses like the common cold or the flu.
div.a: Read More about Health News - Corona Virus
